mapper.insert: INSERT INTO HABIT_ANALYSIS (HABIT_SQ, ANS_SQ, HABIT_COUNT) VALUES (#{habitSq}, #{ansSq}, #{habitCount})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM HABIT_ANALYSIS WHERE ANS_SQ = #{ansSq} AND habit_count > 0

SELECT a.interview_sq, SUM(d.habit_count) AS habit_count FROM habit_analysis d, answer c, question b, (SELECT interview_sq FROM interview WHERE mem_id = #{memId}) a WHERE b.interview_sq IN a.interview_sq AND c.quest_sq IN b.quest_sq AND d.ans_sq IN c.ans_sq AND ROWNUM < 6 GROUP BY a.interview_sq ORDER BY a.interview_sq DESC
